#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#define MAX 1000001
using namespace std;

int id[MAX];
int size[MAX];
int n;

void init(int x)
{
	n = x;
	for(int i = 1;i <= x;i++ )
	{
		size[i] = 1;
		id[i] = i;
	}
}

int find(int p)
{
	return (id[p] == p ? p : id[p] = find(id[p]));
}

void merge(int a,int b)
{
	if(size[find(a)] > size[find(b)])
	{
		size[find(a)] += size[find(b)];
		id[find(b)] = find(a);
	}
	else
	{
		size[find(b)] += size[find(a)];
		id[find(a)] = find(b);
	}
}

void take_input()
{
	int t;
	int n,c,q;
	int a,b;
	
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d",&n,&c);
		init(n);
		for(int i=0;i<c;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
			merge(a,b);
		}
		scanf("%d",&q);
		for(int i=0;i<q;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
			printf(find(a)==find(b) ? "Yes\n" : "No\n");
		}
	}
}

int main()
{
	take_input();
}
